name: nobelist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who has won a Nobel Prize (= any of the six international prizes that are given each year to people who make important discoveries or progress in chemistry, physics, medicine, literature, peace, and economics): Her work had already shown that she was a possible future Nobelist. A Nobelist ten years ago, he is now one of the leading figures in cancer research.
More examplesFewer examplesI never imagined that I might one day become a Nobelist.The country has had more Nobelists than any other.The latest literary Nobelist is surely one of the most deserving, given the impact her work has had on society.
